nodes.title: Microsoft
nodes.short_description: Major competitor in search, cloud, AI; partnership with OpenAI intensifies rivalry across core markets.

nodes.title: Meta Platforms
nodes.short_description: Competes for digital ad spend and user attention; challenges YouTube and Google ads.

nodes.title: Amazon
nodes.short_description: Competes in ads and cloud; shopping search diverts queries and budgets from Google.

nodes.title: ByteDance
nodes.short_description: TikTok competes with YouTube for video engagement and ad dollars.

nodes.title: OpenAI
nodes.short_description: AI breakthroughs and ChatGPT reshape search/user behavior, pressuring Google's core.

nodes.title: Nvidia
nodes.short_description: Critical supplier of GPUs for Alphabet’s AI training and inference infrastructure.

nodes.title: Google Search
nodes.short_description: Alphabet's primary revenue engine; distribution, defaults, and quality directly drive financial performance.

nodes.title: YouTube
nodes.short_description: Large ad platform; engagement and creator ecosystem materially affect revenue.

nodes.title: Android
nodes.short_description: Mobile OS underpinning Google services distribution and Play ecosystem economics.

nodes.title: Google Chrome
nodes.short_description: Browser controlling search defaults and web platform strategy; key to traffic acquisition.

nodes.title: U.S. Department of Justice (Antitrust Division)
nodes.short_description: Brings antitrust actions against Google affecting search and ad tech practices.

nodes.title: Digital Markets Act (EU)
nodes.short_description: EU law imposing gatekeeper obligations on Google services and app distribution.

nodes.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
nodes.short_description: EU privacy law constraining data collection/targeting; impacts ads and product design.

nodes.title: Digital Advertising
nodes.short_description: Primary industry for Alphabet’s revenue; cyclicality and competition directly influence results.

nodes.title: United States v. Google LLC (Search antitrust)
nodes.short_description: DOJ case targeting default search and exclusionary agreements; potential remedies could reshape business.
